Project Name¶


what’s in a name? that which we call a rose
by any other word would smell as sweet

from: The Tragedy of Romeo and Juliet
by William Shakespeare

SUREPY¶

The python project we call surepy is a python-based library with code for analyzing fluoresence super-resolution microscopy data. Therefore, the acronym might stand for super-resolution python.
